reference.shortdesc: Set the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) settings.

section.title: Syntax
section.note: LDAP cannot be used for the bucket authentication.

section.title: Description
section.p: Use this command to set various options for LDAP.
section.note: The setting-ldap command is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Please use admin-role-manage instead.

section.title: Options
section.p: The following are the command options:

row.entry: Setting up full LDAP administrators, comma-separated.
Setting up a read-only LDAP administrators, comma-separated.
Enables the LDAP protocol for authentication (yes=1, no=0).
